SIESTA Support

SIMUNE is a company offering advanced atomic-scale simulation solutions for our research, academic and industrial customers working in the development of novel materials across a variety of technological applications such as electronics, energy storage, chemistry, biosciences, etc.

SIMUNE currently offers:

Professional support for SIESTA and TranSIESTA

Pre- and Post- processing and graphical tools for an efficient use of SIESTA and TranSIESTA

Consultancy Services

For more information, please visit: www.simune.eu

SIMUNE has received funds to develop the project: SIESTA-PRO Spanish Initiative for Electronic Simulations with Thousands of Atoms: Open Source Code with Professional Support and Warranty. The project (RTC-2016-5681-7) has been funded by the Spanish Ministry of Economy, Industry and Competitiveness and has been co-financed by the European Structural and Investment Funds with the objective to promote the technological developmen, innovation and quality research.
